readable.title: 2196316998_3b2d63f01f
readable.content: A man grabs the end of a set of bagpipes while another man plays . A man is playing blowing into bagpipes whilst another man tests the tone with an electronic tuner . A man plays a bagpipe while another checks on the instrument . Two men are wearing black hats and carrying bagpipes . Two men , one playing a bagpipe and one adjusting the bagpipe .
